headline: Zoetis (NYSE:ZTS) Stock Drops 11% Over Last Week
summary: Zoetis (NYSE:ZTS) experienced a 11% decline in its stock price over the last week. This move occurred amidst a highly volatile market, with the S&P 500 down 12% due to escalating U.S.-China trade tensions and a broad-based sell-off in various sectors, including pharmaceuticals. While the company saw price pressures similar to those affecting pharmaceutical stocks as well as broader economic uncertainty, it should be noted that Zoetis's movement is in line with general market trends,...
